events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to a wrong item being delivered.
Support agent Alex has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order.
Hello! I’m Alex and I’ll assist you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed, may I also get a photo of the item you received and a brief description of what was incorrect?
My order number is 4587321. I attached photos showing I received a blue shirt instead of the red one I ordered.
Thanks for the details. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method and you can keep the incorrect shirt as an apology.
Thank you for the quick response and the option to keep the item. That solution works well for me.
Your refund has been processed and you should see the amount reflected in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to make sure your refund was received successfully and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since we haven’t heard otherwise, we are closing this case. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
